# Onboarding

## General access to lab resources
- [ ] Ask me to add you to our Lab Slack Channel
- [ ] Share your email with me to to gain access to our Google Drive. This will give you editing access to:
    - the lab webpage, where you can add yourself to the People page
    - A shared lab resources folder
    - The Gatins Lab calendar
- [ ] Create a GitHub account (if you don't have one already) and ask me to add you as a collaborator to this protocols page

## General MSC requirements
*Navigate to our lab Onboarding Docs to find all the documents listed below*
- [ ] Fill out the [Intake form](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeRMAg-o4vpdjGcVK-HBbFxNBGn3mARwnBbX9F4UOrTeDf9nQ/viewform) for the MSC
- [ ] Read the **Lab Safety Plan** and electronically sign the [**Lab Safety Agreement**](https://drive.google.com/drive/u/0/folders/1RO_sHPwa3eDx0-oPS0HqBablwW_Gx5R4) and [**Lab Access Waiver**](https://drive.google.com/drive/u/0/folders/1RO_sHPwa3eDx0-oPS0HqBablwW_Gx5R4), these forms should be sent to Ryan Hill (r.hill@northeastern.edu).
